eu.wauz.wauzcore.system.listeners

Class PlayerInteractionListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.system.listeners.PlayerInteractionListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class PlayerInteractionListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
    A listener to catch events, related to interactions between the player and the server or other entities.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

        public void onLogin(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerLoginEvent event)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Logs the player into the game. Denies access if the player is banned, not whitelisted or simply when the server is already full.
        Parameters:
        event - The login event.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Error on login.
        See Also:
        WauzPlayerRegistrator.login(Player)

      • onDoubleJump

        public void onDoubleJump(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerToggleFlightEvent event)
        Starts a double jump if a player tries to fly in the hub. This is used for faster travelling and exploration.
        Parameters:
        event - The flight toggle event.

      • onSprint

        public void onSprint(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerToggleSprintEvent event)
        Measures the time a player sprinted. Used to increase the breath skill in MMORPG mode.
        Parameters:
        event - The sprint toggle event.
